prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Show me the concrete truth of what are Stefan's feelings and intentions towards me?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a systematic list of the chart data drawn from your horary chart for this question, organized by category using horary principles only:

1. PLANETARY POSITIONS (with degrees and noted retrogrades)
 • Sun at 18°03′ Aquarius
 • Moon at 4°38′ Gemini
 • Mercury at 15°55′ Aquarius
 • Venus at 1°38′ Aries
 • Mars at 18°59′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter at 11°17′ Gemini
 • Saturn at 18°02′ Pisces
 • Uranus at 23°16′ Taurus
 • Neptune at 28°08′ Pisces
 • Pluto at 2°13′ Aquarius
 • North Node at 29°33′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron at 19°40′ Aries
 • Ascendant at 8°15′ Aries

2. HOUSE PLACEMENTS (as provided via the house system)
 • 1st House (Questioner – you): Starts at 8° Aries; contains Chiron
 • 2nd House: Starts at 22° Taurus; contains Moon, Jupiter, and Uranus
 • 3rd House: Starts at 16° Gemini
 • 4th House: Starts at 4° Cancer; contains Mars
 • 5th House: Starts at 22° Cancer
 • 6th House: Starts at 20° Leo
 • 7th House: Starts at 8° Libra
 • 8th House: Starts at 22° Scorpio
 • 9th House: Starts at 16° Sagittarius
 • 10th House: Starts at 4° Capricorn
 • 11th House: Starts at 22° Capricorn; contains Sun, Mercury, and Pluto
 • 12th House (Stefan’s representation via the Ascendant’s 9th in cross-reference): Starts at 20° Aquarius; contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node

3. MAJOR ASPECTS (with orbs as provided; these will be critical in a horary methodical analysis)
 • MC Opposition IC (exact orb: 0°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 0°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 1°)
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb: 1°)
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Venus conjunct North Node (orb: 2°)
 • Moon trine Pluto (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Jupiter sextile Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Moon sextile Venus (orb: 3°)
 • Venus square IC (orb: 3°)
 • Venus square MC (orb: 3°)
 • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb: 3°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 3°)
 • Mercury sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • Moon sextile Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Ascendant square IC (orb: 4°)
 • Ascendant square MC (orb: 4°)
 • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Sun square Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Pluto sextile Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Moon sextile Neptune (orb: 6°)
 • Neptune square IC (orb: 6°)
 • Neptune square MC (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 7°)
 • Venus conjunct Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Moon conjunct Jupiter (orb: 7°)
 • Sun trine Jupiter (orb: 7°)

4. PATTERNS AND STRUCTURES
 • Stellium noted involving the 12th House region (Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node) and the Ascendant region (with Venus and Chiron featuring in Aries), reinforcing a strong focus on the matters of relationships and hidden dynamics.
 • T-Square formations:
  – One T-Square involving the MC (4° Capricorn), Ascendant (8° Aries), and IC (4° Cancer) with Venus in Aries as part of this configuration.
  – A second T-Square involving the MC (4° Capricorn), Neptune in Pisces, and IC (4° Cancer.); these squares indicate internal tension with potential for revelations.

5. TRANSIT/RETROGRADE NOTES (as applicable in horary context)
 • Mars and the North Node are retrograde; such retrograde conditions are factors in horary analysis, often indicating internalized or reflective energies related to the inquiry.
 • No additional transits beyond the chart’s moment are provided; the reading here rests solely on natal/horary placements.

6. CROSS REFERENCE – STEFAN’S REPRESENTATION
 • According to your House X-Ref, Stefan is represented by the Ascendant’s 9th House. In this chart system, that corresponds to Stefan’s 12th House.
 • The 12th House includes Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node. These placements and aspects (especially the conjunctions and aspects involving Venus, Neptune, and the North Node) will thus be key markers for deciphering his feelings and intentions.

The above listed data forms the foundational elements for a methodical horary interpretation based strictly on the chart details provided.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the chart data, Stefan’s representation—the 12th House cluster containing Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node—indicates his feelings are hidden and conflicted. Venus in this placement suggests that beneath a reserved exterior lies an impulsive passion, one that is both longing and tentative. Its placement in Aries adds a spark of immediacy, yet its location in the realm of hidden matters means Stefan does not display his desire openly.

Saturn in Pisces introduces a layer of caution and self-imposed restraint. It represents the weight of duty and a fear of disrupting established order, hinting that practical, perhaps moral, considerations hold his deeper emotions in check. Saturn’s influence here may also denote an underlying seriousness about the potential consequences of acting upon his attraction.

Neptune, tightly conjoined with the North Node and in Pisces, infuses his inner life with idealism and dreamlike visions of what might be rather than what is. This alignment points to a karmic undertone—implying that there is a fate-driven quality to his attraction—but also a risk of delusion. His emotions are likely filtered through an idealistic lens, making it difficult for him to distinguish between genuine connection and a fantasy fueled by unattainable ideals.

The aspects involving Venus—sextile Pluto and its squares to both the IC and MC—reveal that his secret passion holds the potential for profound transformation. At the same time, these tensions suggest a collision between his inner, authentic self (symbolized by the IC) and his external, socially responsible persona (symbolized by the MC). This conflict indicates that while his feelings run deep and carry transformative energy, they are burdened by the constraints of his public and familial obligations.

The T-Square pattern involving the Ascendant, IC, and MC further highlights a dynamic of inner versus outer realities. His concealed emotions (the 12th House signature) are at odds with the visible structure of his life. This results in an internal struggle where his true inclinations remain buried, expressed only indirectly through symbolic or accidental actions.

In summary, the evidence from the horary chart reveals that Stefan harbors a secret, passionate attraction towards you. His feelings combine spontaneity with a desire for intimacy, yet they are counterbalanced by a strong sense of duty and the weight of his public responsibilities. The transformative potential indicated by the Venus-Pluto aspect suggests that if external circumstances shift, his inner truth might eventually emerge. However, at present, his intentions appear to be cautious, with his heart confined to a private realm that he is reluctant to expose openly.
swipes:
Based on the chart data, Stefan’s representation—the 12th House cluster containing Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node—indicates his feelings are hidden and conflicted. Venus in this placement suggests that beneath a reserved exterior lies an impulsive passion, one that is both longing and tentative. Its placement in Aries adds a spark of immediacy, yet its location in the realm of hidden matters means Stefan does not display his desire openly.

Saturn in Pisces introduces a layer of caution and self-imposed restraint. It represents the weight of duty and a fear of disrupting established order, hinting that practical, perhaps moral, considerations hold his deeper emotions in check. Saturn’s influence here may also denote an underlying seriousness about the potential consequences of acting upon his attraction.

Neptune, tightly conjoined with the North Node and in Pisces, infuses his inner life with idealism and dreamlike visions of what might be rather than what is. This alignment points to a karmic undertone—implying that there is a fate-driven quality to his attraction—but also a risk of delusion. His emotions are likely filtered through an idealistic lens, making it difficult for him to distinguish between genuine connection and a fantasy fueled by unattainable ideals.

The aspects involving Venus—sextile Pluto and its squares to both the IC and MC—reveal that his secret passion holds the potential for profound transformation. At the same time, these tensions suggest a collision between his inner, authentic self (symbolized by the IC) and his external, socially responsible persona (symbolized by the MC). This conflict indicates that while his feelings run deep and carry transformative energy, they are burdened by the constraints of his public and familial obligations.

The T-Square pattern involving the Ascendant, IC, and MC further highlights a dynamic of inner versus outer realities. name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you. That tells me what his feelings are. Now, tell me what are his intentions towards me.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the horary data concerning Stefan’s representation in the 12th House:

• Venus in Aries within his cluster reveals that his intentions, while fueled by a spontaneous attraction, remain veiled. This Venus suggests that his initial impulse is to act upon his desire discreetly rather than overtly.

• Saturn in Pisces infuses his decision-making with caution and responsibility. His intentions are tempered by a sense of duty and the gravity of his current commitments, indicating that while he may internally yearn to align closer with you, he consciously restrains himself.

• Neptune conjoined with the North Node in Pisces adds an element of idealism and karmic influence. This placement signals that his intentions are not merely personal or fleeting—they carry a weight of destiny and a longing for something transcending ordinary connection. However, it also cautions that he may be driven by an impressionistic vision rather than practical considerations.

• The aspects, notably Venus’s squares to both the IC and MC, point to a conflict between what he secretly desires and the external obligations or reputational concerns that bind him. This suggests that while his inner state leans toward taking a risk if the opportunity allows, he is likely to maintain secrecy, avoiding actions that would disrupt the established order of his life.

• The T-Square involving the Ascendant, IC, and MC further emphasizes the tension between his inner, authentic intentions and the external appearance he maintains publicly. His actions, if any, are likely to be characterized by subtle, indirect gestures rather than overt declarations.

In summation, Stefan’s intentions toward you are marked by a covert longing and idealistic attraction, coupled with a strong reticence to disturb his current responsibilities. He is inclined toward a hidden, tentative approach. If circumstances shift and allow him to reconcile these internal conflicts with external realities, his actions may become more forthcoming, yet for now, his path remains one of cautious reserve.
